comment.author: 87298822@N05
comment._content: The Old Courthouse now houses the Museum of Antigua & Barbuda. The street in front of it is Long Street and the street above is Market Street (Formerly Scott's Row).

comment.author: 87335114@N03
comment._content: The old courthouse is probably one of the most wel preserved historical building in St. John's. Love it! Had quite a few trips to the Museum it now houses while I was in Primary & Secondary School. Very well laid-out exhibits.
